attributes.action: to change the voting system to  'proportional representation'
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In the Labour party Manifesto 10 years ago (1997), when Labour came to power, it says (And I quote) "An independent commission on voting systems will be appointed early to recommend a proportional alternative to the first-past-the-post system. "
This is another promise that this Labour government have
broken. They've had 10 years to change.
